NEAR Dev NEWS 10th edition milestone : Curating content for the newsletter...involving sifting through all DevHub Communities Telegram channels to filter relevant updates, engaging with moderators for reviews, sourcing additional technical updates from external channels, editing ,compiling and taking notes of improvements. **37H**\\\\n\\\\n2. {"body": {"name": "DevHub Developer Contributor report by Peter for 2024-04-20 - 2024-05-20", "summary": "Requesting funding for my DevHub contributions in the period 20th of April to 20th of May 2024. 48.5 hours in total. Main focus in this period has been functionality for tracking visitors across DevHub. SEO friendly links with Social Media previews backed by web4, Blog search and RFP tests.", "category": "DevDAO Platform", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "theori.near", "description": "Below is a log of the time spent for various tasks. As usual I am asking for the compensation rate of $150 per hour, which I consider the rate for a senior developer/architect in Norway, also then taking into account expenses of self employment.\\\\n\\\\n| Date       | Amount | Task                               | Issue/PR                                                                                                             | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |\\\\n| ---------- | ------ | ---------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |\\\\n| 2024-04-20 | 4      | Track visitors                     | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/731](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/731) | Setup of posthog, implemented tracking code, prepared gh actions pipeline, implementing of tracking visitors tests, simple dashboard, handling of both authenticated and not auth users.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |\\\\n| 2024-04-24 | 0,5    | Blogs                              |                                                                                                                      | Call with Thomas about the new blog feature for assisting on testing, and searching                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |\\\\n| 2024-04-24 | 0,5    | Sync                               |                                                                                                                      | Weekly sync call                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |\\\\n| 2024-04-27 | 1      | PR reviews                         | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/764](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/764)     | Testing and verified PRs [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/763](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/763), [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/764](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/764) and [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/758](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/758)                                                                                                                                                                                                     |\\\\n| 2024-04-27 | 3      | Social media links                 | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/724](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/724) | web4 implementation, get community content for social media preview headers                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |\\\\n| 2024-04-28 | 4      | Social media links                 | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/724](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/724) | show linked content in the web4 landing page (using near-bos-webcomponent), add support for setting custom properties for other paths than the root in near-bos-webcomponent ( [https://github.com/NEARBuilders/near-bos-webcomponent/pull/10](https://github.com/NEARBuilders/near-bos-webcomponent/pull/10) ) support proposal urls, escape content from contract storage, links to [near.org/near.social](http://near.org/near.social)                                                                                                                                            |\\\\n| 2024-04-29 | 2      | Blogs                              |                                                                                                                      | Call with Thomas on writing tests, and \\\\\\\"don\\\\\\'t ask again\\\\\\\" feature, which is not supported by bos-loader, and has to be developed through tests where we can mock RPCs for getting widget data. Also looking into issue with card widget that wasn\\\\\\'t correctly referenced with vmrequire. 2 hour hacking session                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |\\\\n| 2024-04-30 | 0,5    | Blogs                              |                                                                                                                      | Call with Thomas on tests mostly about playwright setup locally.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |\\\\n| 2024-04-30 | 0,5    | Social media links                 | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/724](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/724) | Resolve PR review comments                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |\\\\n| 2024-05-01 | 1      | Social media links                 | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/724](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/724) | Improve top nav bar UI                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |\\\\n| 2024-05-01 | 1      | Sync                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |\\\\n| 2024-05-01 | 1      | Call with Megha                    |                                                                                                                      | Assistance on Playwright tests                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |\\\\n| 2024-05-01 | 0,5    | Edit proposal timeline permissions |                                                                                                                      | Debugging why moderators were not able to edit proposals, and found the reason that the permission was set to \\\\\\\"any\\\\\\\" instead of \\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\*\\\\\\\" in the latest call here: [https://nearblocks.io/txns/BkYUrcHQbUcJrsuJZSzF3B16PSxqjZzY7U599cVnyLMK?tab=execution](https://nearblocks.io/txns/BkYUrcHQbUcJrsuJZSzF3B16PSxqjZzY7U599cVnyLMK?tab=execution)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |\\\\n| 2024-05-02 | 1      | Social media links                 | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/724](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/724) | top bar according to proposed figma design                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |\\\\n| 2024-05-05 | 1      | Blogs search                       | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/733](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/733) | Playwright test setup for creating posts to be searched                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |\\\\n| 2024-05-06 | 3      | Blogs search                       | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772)     | Simple blog search feature, performance tweaks, including debounce                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |\\\\n| 2024-05-07 | 1      | Blogs search                       | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772)     | Debounce should update at least every 200ms, to ensure updating while typing fast.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |\\\\n| 2024-05-08 | 0,5    | Sync                               |                                                                                                                      | Weekly sync tasks ( action: create ticket for maintenance of multiple instances of the portal )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |\\\\n| 2024-05-09 | 1      | Blogs search                       | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772)     | Assertions for blog search test                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |\\\\n| 2024-05-09 | 2      | RFP (Infrastructure Committee)     | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/4](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/4)       | devcontainer setup, github actions pipeline, wallet state in playwright test, click all header links in test and check page content                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |\\\\n| 2024-05-09 | 0,5    | Events Committee                   |                                                                                                                      | Call with Thomas and Megha about configuring \\\\\\\"Don\\\\\\'t ask again\\\\\\\" tests for events committee                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |\\\\n| 2024-05-10 | 3      | RFP (Infrastructure Committee)     | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/5](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/5)       | Tests for RFP page checking for an RFP item, and also that searching for a non-existing item results in no items visible. test for filling create RFP form, and that create RFP button is not visible for non-admin user.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |\\\\n| 2024-05-11 | 1      | RFP (Infrastructure Committee)     | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/7](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/7)       | Test for creating a proposal linked to an RFP                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |\\\\n| 2024-05-12 | 0,5    | RFP (Infrastructure Committee)     | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/7](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/7)       | should not be able to select category when an RFP is linked                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |\\\\n| 2024-05-15 | 0,5    | Sync                               |                                                                                                                      | Weekly sync call                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |\\\\n| 2024-05-15 | 2      | Blogs v2                           | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/761](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/761)     | Call with Thomas, grouping test, and test assistance                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |\\\\n| 2024-05-17 | 1      | RFP (Infrastructure Committee)     | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/9](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/9)       | tests: mock rpc responses for rfp categories                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |\\\\n| 2024-05-17 | 2      | Blogs search                       | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772)     | Category filtering                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |\\\\n| 2024-05-18 | 4      | Blogs search                       | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772)     | Various attempts on improving performance, but found that the main issue is when the number of blog posts grows big. Increasing debouncing on the input helps, so that typing does not trigger a search/rerender on every keypress. The current solution with all blog posts in memory does not scale, and some indexing is needed if there are many blog posts.Made the debounce timeout configurable on input, and increased it for blog search so that typing the search criteria does not lag. Support selecting \\\\\\\"None\\\\\\\" category. Test for combining search and category filter. |\\\\n| 2024-05-20 | 2      | Blogs search                       | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772)     | Only show search/category filtering if enabled in config                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |\\\\n| 2024-05-20 | 3      | RFP (Infrastructure Committee)     | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/9](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/9)       | Test for cancelling RFP,<br>fix tests: checking that admin link is only visible for admins, mock of linked proposals and rfp state in cancel RFP test.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 48.5\\\\nHourly rate (USD): $150\\\\nTotal requested amount (USD): 7275\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "petersalomonsen.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "7275", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": []}

[https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772)     | Various attempts on improving performance, but found that the main issue is when the number of blog posts grows big. Increasing debouncing on the input helps, so that typing does not trigger a search/rerender on every keypress. The current solution with all blog posts in memory does not scale, and some indexing is needed if there are many blog posts.Made the debounce timeout configurable on input, and increased it for blog search so that typing the search criteria does not lag. Support selecting \\\\\\\"None\\\\\\\" category. Test for combining search and category filter. |\\\\n| 2024-05-20 | 2      | Blogs search                       | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/772)     | Only show search/category filtering if enabled in config                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |\\\\n| 2024-05-20 | 3      | RFP (Infrastructure Committee)     | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/9](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/9)       | Test for cancelling RFP,<br>fix tests: checking that admin link is only visible for admins, mock of linked proposals and rfp state in cancel RFP test.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 48.5\\\\nHourly rate (USD): $150\\\\nTotal requested amount (USD): 7275\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "petersalomonsen.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "7275", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "author_id": "petersalomonsen.near", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}

{"body": {"name": "DevHub Developer Contributor report by Megha for 04/22/2024 \\\\u{2013} 05/19/2024", "summary": "Setup Infrastructure committee BOS website, with RFPs and proposals flow, helped Thomas with events committee.", "category": "DevDAO Platform", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "theori.near", "description": "#### Summary of Activities\\\\n##### Week 1 (22 April to 28 April)\\\\n\\\\n- Fix timeline update after user updates proposal status and reproduce proposal refresh  [#760](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/760) (6h)\\\\n- Proposal enhancements [#763 ](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/763) (5h)\\\\n- Fix issues with compose comment, fix expand/collapse height of editor with long text, show loader, add draft state, show loader until comment is visible [#764](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/764) (1d)\\\\n- Team call (0.5h)\\\\n- Update auto link proposal css, add support to search using title [#758](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/758) (4h)\\\\n- Figure out issue with failing tests all PRs (1h)\\\\n- Estimation for frontend work for infrastructure committee (1h)\\\\n- Add app layout, route navigations for RFP repo and basic tests [#1](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/1) (1d)\\\\n- Call with Vadim regarding infrastructure committee planning (1h)\\\\n- Update admin configuration contract [#766](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/766) (1h)\\\\n- Add tests for compose comment, mock RPC response to show loader (4h)\\\\n\\\\nTotal: 40 hours\\\\n\\\\n##### Week 2 (29 April to May 5)\\\\n- Worked on RFP create page with timeline configuration and integrated contract [#747](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/747) (2d)\\\\n- Worked on view and feed page using indexer for RFP [#748](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/748) (2.5d)\\\\n- Team call (1h)\\\\n- Call with Peter regarding issue with tests (1h)\\\\n- Help Thomas with events committee [#2](https://github.com/Tguntenaar/neardevhub-widgets/pull/2) (3h)\\\\n- Fix moderators edit_member issue [#770](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/770) (0.5h)\\\\n- Fix supervisor requirement in timeline [#771](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/771) (1h)\\\\n\\\\nTotal: 42.5 hours\\\\n\\\\n##### Week 3 (5 May to May 12)\\\\n- Created proposals edit/create page with linking RFP [#6](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/6) (1d)\\\\n- Created Proposal View page and timeline configurator [#750](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/750) (1d)\\\\n- Added proposals feed [#749](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/749) (1d)\\\\n- Team call (0.5h)\\\\n- Call with Vadim regarding timeline (0.5h)\\\\n- Created testing tickets and updated timeline (2h)\\\\n- Integrated linked proposals with RFP [#5](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/5)(1d)\\\\n- Discuss with Peter about tests (2h)\\\\n- Call with Thomas for final testing of events committee to launch it(3h)\\\\n- Discussed with Vadim about issues with contract (3h)\\\\n\\\\nTotal: 43 hours\\\\n\\\\n#### Week 4 (13 May to May 19)\\\\n- Update compose widget to auto link proposals and RFP (4h)\\\\n- Minor UI updates and code refactor for devhub proposals [#779](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/779) (4h)\\\\n- Work on logs for proposals and RFP view page [#6](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/6) (1d)\\\\n- Add cancel RFP modal [#778](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/778) (6h)\\\\n- Team call (1h)\\\\n- Move snapshot history from contract to indexer for proposals and rfps [#6](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/6) (4h)\\\\n- Add admin configuration page with autocomplete [#8](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/8) (4h)\\\\n- Report new bugs to Vadim about indexer (4h)\\\\n- Complete remaining checklist points from RFP and proposal tickets like notifications, allow admin to link/unlink proposal at any stage of RFP, etc.. [#6](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/near-prpsls-bos/pull/6) (1d)\\\\n\\\\nTotal: 43 hours\\\\n\\\\nTotal Hours: 168.5\\\\nHourly rate: $50/h\\\\nTotal: 8425 USD\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "megha19.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "8425", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "OTHER"}, "labels": []}
